attributes.action: Provide Guaranteed Jobs as promised to those under 25 that have been searching for work for over 50 weeks, i.e. those who need it most
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm 25 in September, I'm 24 now, I'm trying to get my guaranteed job via the future jobs fund program and have not been allowed to use it despite being well over 6 months and under 24, I've been passed off to a company called TNG that are so poor it's been over a month since I've heard from them after they promised to send a letter, and been told I'm not allowed into the Future Jobs Fund by Peterborough Jobcentre Plus as they say I'm not eligible despite being 24 and looking for work with them and claiming for over 6 months. Please let me claim my guarantee before I hit 25 or it will have been literally a direct lie in print, It's not a guarantee if those who need it most can't claim it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
